query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_profile_id INT NOT NULL,
  categoria VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  chave VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  valor TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_setting (user_profile_id, categoria, chave)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_profile_id INT NOT NULL,
  categoria VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  chave VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  valor TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_setting (user_profile_id, categoria, chave)
);
